snippet.title: 8 To Glory - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
8 to Glory captures all the thrills and spills of the most punishing sport on dirt and will be available for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on October 30.

In 8 to Glory, players will follow the real 25th PBR Premier season, competing in all 27 events across the U.S. and culminating in the PBR World Finals in Las Vegas. Everything that makes the sport of Professional Bull Riding is packed into 8 to Glory, including professional riders from around the world and the rankest bulls in the sport!

8 to Glory also features versus play so friends can compete head-to-head - or - rider-to-bull to determine who will be the Last Cowboy Standing.

More on 8 to Glory here http://8toglory.com/.
